CustomField.description: ... represents the algorithm identifier leveraged by the B2C Commerce Account Manager to process a JWT token minted by the Salesforce Platform. This identifier is embedded in the JWT.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... represents the algorithm identifier leveraged by the B2C Commerce Account Manager to process a JWT token minted by the Salesforce Platform. This identifier is embedded in the JWT.
CustomField.label: JWT SFCC Algorithm
